column1: '''The Society''' was a dining club associated with the [[University of Oxford]]. [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] became a member in [[Wikipedia:Hilary term
column2: Hilary Term]] [[1935]] and attended most dinners until moving from [[Oxford]].<ref>{{CG
